activities.loc: Branch I, Courthouse Annex, Second Floor

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
8:37 AM Defendant Spencer Richard Burns appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
ADA heard - no atty appointed yet.
Atty Moss is present and is heard - will take the case through the PD's office.
Court appoints Atty Moss.
Atty Moss heard and requests prelim.
Court schedules with parties.
8:39 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

8:57 AM Defendant Spencer Richard Burns appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on Atty.
Deft heard - has spoken to the PD, but has not been appointed an atty yet.
Court reschedules with parties.
8:58 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

1:07 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Spencer Richard Burns appeared by ZOOM, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Spencer Richard Burns. 
Atty Hansen heard - appearing for bond purposes, does qualify, possible conflict of interest within office.
Copy of comp - Atty Hansen and Deft confirm receipt.
Court heard on charges and penalties.
Deft understands.
DA heard on bond and priors.
Atty Hansen heard on bond.
Court sets $20,000 cash w/conditions: sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid RX, no contact with co-deft M.R. or D.H..
1:17 pm
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
